Hello Pen Pals! This is a bonus letter just for you, to thank you for supporting us on Patreon. In this one, we're talking about Fire Emblem Three Houses. We hope you like it!

Summer: Welcome to the Fire Emblem: Three Houses Chat

Jillian: yayyyy

we‚Äôve each already talked about fe3h in this newsletter‚Äîyou recommended it first, and then i wrote a follow-up about it more recently

since you played it first, why don‚Äôt you talk a little bit about how and why you got into fe3h

Summer: yeah!

So my brother has been into the Fire Emblem franchise for a while. we have the GBA one that was, I think? the first one available in the US

he hadn‚Äôt played any of the more recent ones, but after the nintendo direct with the three houses trailer we both thought it looked really really good. he got it right around when it came out but i was AFRAID because i had attempted to play the old old GBA one when i was a child, as well as some other jrpgs like golden sun, and i was bad at them.

because i was a child. like 6

but he said it was really fun and there was a lot of room for a beginner, he hadn‚Äôt bought me a birthday or graduation present lol and venmod me money for the game and the DLC. and then i played every day for 7 hours for like two weeks and here we are over a year later!

Jillian: and then you talked about it so much that i also bought it, basically

Summer: literally yes. i remember we were doing a video call and our other friends ghosted and i just talked about fire emblem for 40 minutes

Jillian: i was on the fence about it for a while because i had only ever played one jrpg before (which i won‚Äôt name) and i didn‚Äôt‚Ä¶‚Ä¶love it? so i thought maybe i just wasn‚Äôt into that kind of game

Summer: same! i remember you talking about that game and was also like yeah i didn‚Äôt want to get it For That Reason

Jillian: and i was really worried that even though you loved this game so much i just wouldn‚Äôt, and i didn‚Äôt want to buy something and try it and not like it, especially after you talked it up so much

it also wasn‚Äôt just you‚Äîit kind of felt like everybody i knew was playing it for a while

so i was curious

and i wanted to know what the hype was about

and i was getting really antsy waiting for animal crossing to come out

Summer: oh my god you DID buy it like‚Ä¶beginning of march i remember this

Jillian: basically about a week or two before the new animal crossing game came out, i decided i needed a new game to distract me from the waiting, and i impulse-bought fire emblem three houses and that was that

i loved it pretty much right away, because you were right and it‚Äôs great

Summer: IT‚ÄôS GREAT!!!

I‚Äôve been trying to think about like‚Ä¶what‚Äôs so great about it?

Jillian: ‚ÄúI described this game to my brother as an anime where the commercial breaks are chess, and honestly? It‚Äôs the best.‚Äù

this is so true and good lol

some of my favorite descriptions of fe3h, which i mentioned in my follow-up letter about it, are ‚Äúhorny magic war school‚Äù and ‚Äúanime chess‚Äù

Summer: YES!

oh my god. yes that‚Äôs it

Jillian: but you also mention that the gameplay is very streamlined to your tastes, which i think is important!

Summer: our friend leyla‚Äôs discord has a channel for it, called ‚Äúwar crime dating sim‚Äù lmao which is so good

Jillian: my favorite discord channel tbh

but yeah! i think what i‚Äôm realizing more and more is that it‚Äôs really important to me for games to be like‚Ä¶.attempting to please different types of players

and by that i mean, not cynical towards people who don‚Äôt necessary like hard games?

Jillian: i do think that‚Äôs a lot of why fe3h was so successful

Summer: my boyfriend plays all video games on easy mode and loves when there are things like ‚Äústory-mode‚Äù where you can just play through plot, but i noticed the way some of those games label their modes are really mean!!!

Jillian: i also love playing on easy mode

games with story mode are very important to me

Summer: yes!!! i think that‚Äôs why hades, similarly, is really popular right now

games with a really rich story but incredible replay value either because of small details OR ability to change up gameplay

i‚Äôm re-playing golden deer right now, and even though i know that story so intimately i‚Äôm playing on hard mode and it‚Äôs been really fun to seriously focus on battle mechanisms

Jillian: i have not played hades mostly because‚Ä¶again‚Ä¶it doesn‚Äôt really seem like my ‚Äútype‚Äù of game and it looks kind of hard?

but saying that here sounds so silly

because that‚Äôs how i felt about fire emblem and now look at me

i love it so much

Summer: yes!!!! ok hades is really hard in the beginning but it gets easier as you play more. we can talk offline but yeah

and like not easier because you get better skill-wise but literally the game makes you stronger when you die lol!

Jillian: oh that brings me to another thing that i love about it which is: it‚Äôs very replayable! and in fact you should replay it! multiple times!

did they say this somewhere

that‚Äôs‚Ä¶wow

i‚Äôm sure there are plenty of people who only play it once but i just can‚Äôt imagine doing it that way

i finished golden deer and immediately started blue lions

and now i‚Äôm taking a short break, but i‚Äôm really excited to get back into it and play black eagles next

Summer: ‚ÄúWe had thought that everybody would play around with one of the routes and then enjoy asking each other about their respective routes. It was surprising, though; more people ended up playing all of the routes than we had originally expected.‚Äù (source)

Jillian: that‚Äôs so funny

Summer: right?

Jillian: i love the way each of the routes has its own unique story

and how seeing the story again after you‚Äôve already played it once can change the way you view it

Summer: so my brother started with blue lions, and i started with golden deer. he also watched a playthrough of black eagles‚Äîwe had all pieces of the story, theoretically, but still played all of them after anyway

Summer: yes!!!! claude is the best, but it‚Äôs just. the best story! it‚Äôs the most holistic

and blue lions is a little more contained to what‚Äôs happening specifically in The Kingdom, lol
